Header: Organizing secretary post of Frontline Party for Kumar Gunaratnam
Content: Kumar Gunaratnam who had been remanded over the charge of violating immigration and emigration laws was appointed as the organizing secretary of the Frontline Socialist Party yesterday. The appointment was announced at the party’s second national general convention held at the Sugathadasa stadium. Other appointments made yesterday include Senadheera Gunatilleke as general secretary,Duminda Nagamuwa as propaganda secretary,Chameera Koswatta as administrative secretary, Pubdu Jayagoda as Education Secretary and Wimal Wattuheva  as Finance Secretary. The Party Central Committee comprises of 15 persons.
